span.b: **ALL MaST Schools will be closed until further notice (updated: 4/9/2020)

div.p: MaST Schools will be closed for the rest of the academic year due to the Governor’s order to close all schools in PA. The school will be sending out more updates in the near future around the events and activities scheduled for the rest of year.

p.span: 3/13 – MAAST Talent Show at Byberry Campus
3/13 – Designer Bag and Power Tool Bingo
3/19 to 3/22 – Drama Performances at MaST Byberry
3/27 – 5th/6th Gr. Glow Dance at MaST Byberry

p.b: Information on the following will come out at a later date:

li.span: Field trip rescheduling will come from the teacher at a later date.
Calendar adjustments when and if it is needed.
Updates on any fees collected: before/aftercare, field trips, athletics

div.p: Please see attached from SDP: Food Services, Facilities, and The Office of School Safety will be managing and supporting the SDP sites on the ATTACHED list where they will be operating food distribution from 9 AM to 12:00 PM. Students will be able to “grab and go” two meals.

p.b: Additional information and resources surrounding COVID-19 can found below:

a.span: CDC Communication Print and Video Resources
